modName: Devanthars Wooden Sword - Retextured Iron Longsword
summary: Retextured version of the regular Iron Longsword
descriptionHtml:
Are you bored of killing everything, with highpower-godblessed-souleating weapons?

Than you should take use of Devnthars Wooden Sword.
Nothing shows more that you have balls, except using a wooden sword to slaughter a dragon!
This sword can everything like a usual sword. You can block, stab, slash and even decapitate your enemies! All you need is just two pieces of firewood and a little bit home improvement skills!

Unbelievable? Just try it! Let your enemy first laugh and later scream about your WOODEN SWORD!

- This is my very first modification so please don\'t judge me to hard. ;)
- This sword can\'t be found in a shop. You have to craft it by your self. But it is easy to made!
- This sword does lightly less damage than the regular Iron Longsword but its faster and less heavy.

That\'s all, so have fun! :)

PS: Sorry about my english, i did my best! ;)
author: Devanthar
